name: NHL Stanley Cup Winners Online Quiz | Ice Hockey | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 1997 and 1998 this team won the Stanley Cup. In both finals the team did not lose a game. Which team was this?
questions.explanation:
Detroit Red Wings.

	Detroit defeated Philadelphia and Washington. The games in the final of Detroit and Philadelphia was 4-2, 4-2, 6-1, 2-1. The final against Washington scores were 2-1, 5-4, 2-1, 4-1.

questions.text: Which team won five straight Stanley Cups from 1956-1960, and four straight cups from 1976-1979?
questions.explanation:
Montreal Canadiens.

	The Montreal Canadiens never went to a game seven in any of the following finals, and only 5 teams made the finals to verse Montreal in the finals. Boston lost 4 times against Montreal.

questions.text: Which team won the Stanley Cup 3 straight times from 1947-1949 and 1962-1964?
questions.explanation:
Toronto Maple Leafs.

	Toronto took down Detroit 4 times, and Chicago and Montreal once during those 6 finals.

questions.text: From 1980-1983, which team won four straight cups, which were their first-ever cups won?
questions.explanation:
New York Islanders.

	The Islanders won their 4 cups from 1980-83. They defeated Philadelphia, Minnesota North Stars, Vancouver, and Edmonton. Unfortunately, they lost in the next season's final.

questions.text: Which team won 5 cups in 1984, 1985, 1987, 1988, and 1990?
questions.explanation:
Edmonton Oilers.

	Edmonton lost to the New York Islanders 4-0 in the 1983. The next year they defeated them in the finals 4-1. They also defeated Boston and Philadelphia twice.

questions.text: Which team won 2 straight cups in 1991 and 1992?
questions.explanation:
Pittsburgh Penguins.

	Pittsburgh defeated the Minnesota North Stars 4-2 and Chicago Blackhawks 4-0. After that in 2008, they lost to Detroit but won against them in 2009.

questions.text: Which NHL team won their first Stanley Cup in 1989?
questions.explanation:
Calgary Flames.

	Calgary won the cup by defeating Montreal 4-2.

questions.text: Who won the first-ever NHL Stanley Cup in 1928?
questions.explanation:
New York Rangers.

	New York Rangers defeated Montreal Maroons 3-2 in the finals.

questions.text: Which team won the cup in 1929, 1939, 1941, 1970, and 1972?
questions.explanation:
Boston Bruins.

	The Boston Bruins were one of Original Six.

questions.text: Which team won cups in 1934, 1938, and 1961?
questions.explanation:
Chicago Blackhawks.

	Chicago set a record for the longest time not winning the Stanley Cup. In 2010, they won against Philadelphia.
